short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads data on the current page and summarizes it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension leverages built-in Chrome AI capabilities to streamline the process of extracting and summarizing content from web pages. Designed for professionals, researchers, and avid readers, the extension simplifies content consumption by providing concise summaries, saving users time and effort.
Key Features:

    Automated Summarization: Uses AI-powered algorithms to generate a clear and comprehensive summary of the web page content.
    Cache and Storage Optimization: Saves web page content for reuse, minimizing redundant processing.
    User-Friendly Interface: A clean UI with simple interactions, including a single-click summarization button and an accessible output area.
    Adaptable Summarizer: Automatically assesses AI capabilities and adjusts summarization methods for efficient processing.

Why Use This Extension?

    Boost Productivity: Spend less time reading long articles and more time focusing on actionable insights.
    Intelligent Features: Built-in caching and AI meta-tag analysis ensure you get the most relevant information quickly.
    Convenient Workflow: Works seamlessly within your browser, eliminating the need for external tools or manual effort.
    Reliable Performance: Robust error handling and fallback mechanisms ensure uninterrupted usage.

Whether you're researching, working, or just browsing, this extension empowers you to stay informed and efficient by making complex content accessible and concise.
